actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A bill to amend the International Security Assistance and Arms export Control Act of 1976 by extending the deadline for submitting the results of a study on the effects of certain arms export controls.

summary.text: Amends the International Security Assistance and Arms Export Control Act of 1976 to extend the deadline for submission of the results of a study on the effects of arms export controls.

titles.title: A bill to amend the International Security Assistance and Arms export Control Act of 1976 by extending the deadline for submitting the results of a study on the effects of certain arms export controls.
